scripts.dev-full: concurrently -n vite,server,queue -c green,magenta,yellow "npm run dev" "npm run server" "npm run queue"
scripts.server:xdebug-off: set XDEBUG_MODE=off&& set XDEBUG_START_WITH_REQUEST=no&& set XDEBUG_CONFIG=&& php -d xdebug.mode=off -d xdebug.start_with_request=0 -d xdebug.discover_client_host=0 -d xdebug.log_level=0 artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8484
scripts.queue:xdebug-off: set XDEBUG_MODE=off&& set XDEBUG_START_WITH_REQUEST=no&& set XDEBUG_CONFIG=&& php -d xdebug.mode=off -d xdebug.start_with_request=0 -d xdebug.discover_client_host=0 -d xdebug.log_level=0 artisan queue:work
scripts.dev-full:xdebug-off: concurrently -n vite,server,queue -c green,magenta,yellow "npm run dev" "npm run server:xdebug-off" "npm run queue:xdebug-off"
scripts.server:xdebug-on: set XDEBUG_MODE=debug,develop&& set XDEBUG_START_WITH_REQUEST=yes&& php -d xdebug.mode=debug,develop -d xdebug.start_with_request=1 -d xdebug.discover_client_host=0 -d xdebug.client_host=127.0.0.1 -d xdebug.client_port=9003 artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=8484
scripts.queue:xdebug-on: set XDEBUG_MODE=debug,develop&& set XDEBUG_START_WITH_REQUEST=yes&& php -d xdebug.mode=debug,develop -d xdebug.start_with_request=1 -d xdebug.discover_client_host=0 -d xdebug.client_host=127.0.0.1 -d xdebug.client_port=9003 artisan queue:work
scripts.dev-full:xdebug-on: concurrently -n vite,server,queue -c green,magenta,yellow "npm run dev" "npm run server:xdebug-on" "npm run queue:xdebug-on"
